title: Western world
summary: The Western world, also known as the West, refers to various regions, nations and states, depending on the context, most often consisting of the majority of Europe,[lower-alpha 1] Northern America,[lower-alpha 2] and Australasia.[3] The Western world is also known as the Occident (from the Latin word occidens, "sunset, West"), in contrast to the Orient (from the Latin word oriens, "rise, East") or Eastern world. It might mean the Northern half of the Northâ€“South divide, the countries of the Global North (often equated with developed countries).[4]
